name: Orran Krieger
content: Orran Krieger, PhD | College of Engineering Orran Krieger, PhDProfessor (ECE) Office 11 Cummington Mall, Rm 227-GEmail okrieg@bu.eduPhone (617) 358-6697 Website Mass Open CloudAlternate Website Personal Website Education PhD, University of Toronto, 1994Primary Appointment Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Areas of Interest Systems Cloud Computing Operating Systems Big Data Platforms Distributed Systems PublicationsView a complete list of publications chronologically by year.View a complete list of publications by citation. Honors and Awards 2016 Hariri Institute Faculty Fellow (BU) Cloud Summit Chair, IC2E 2014 Founding Director, Cloud Computing Initiative Boston University, 2013 Guest Editor, IEEE Internet Computing, April 2013 Senior Fellow, Hariri Institute, 2011 Program Chair, VEE, 2009 Started vCloud and vCloud Director at VMware, 2007 Guest Editor Operating System Review, April 2006, July 2009, Dec 2010 Best Paper Award, OSDI 1996Classes Taught EC 500 A1/CS 591 K1: Cloud ComputingAdditional Affiliations Red Hat Collaboratory @BU, co-Director MOC Alliance, Director Department or Division: Electrical & Computer Engineering Affiliations: Intelligent, Autonomous & Secure Systems, Primary & Affiliated Faculty View all profiles
